org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports

Class ReportAreaImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports.ReportAreaImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReportArea, ReportVisitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaginatedReportArea, PartialReportArea, ReportAreaForTests

    public class ReportAreaImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReportArea
    Holds report output content as map of columns and cells, or as a parent of ReportArea children.
    See Also:
    ReportArea

      • getOwner

        public AreaOwner getOwner()
        Description copied from interface: ReportArea
        returns the localized owner. For a row, it is the activity/pledge/whatever which owns the row. For a report subregion, it is the "splitter cell"
